revised_title: A New Approach to Wave Mechanics and Radiation Theory
tldr: The author proposes a new approach to wave mechanics and radiation theory, focusing on a mathematical equation and interpretations that can be applied to unnatural systems containing sources and sinks of matter. The theory aims to provide a simpler and more direct approach to understanding the interaction of radiation and matter, without relying on complex expansions or non-commuting quantities. This new perspective could potentially resolve some of the difficulties encountered in current theories and provide a more accurate representation of natural systems.
